name: artists
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Returns a list of all music Artists who contributed to JSR/JSRF

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: The field to sort the items by. Possible values include any field on the document (e.g., 'name', 'stats'). Default is 'name'.

orderby.description:
Possible Values:
 - `asc`
 - `desc`

sortBy must be present for this to take effect. 
The default value is `asc`
